## Welcome !

I am a PhD candidate in Economics at the University of Montreal.
I specialize in Bayesian econometrics and Computational methods, with interest for applications in financial economics.
My current research focus on high-frequency data with the analysis of intra-day duration between financial transactions.
I am a data enthusiast always interested in new applications.

I am on the Job Market and will be available for interviews on **December 6-7 at the CEEE meeting** in Toronto, and on **January 3-5 at the ASSA meeting** in San Diego.

My full CV is available [here](SamuelGingras_CV.pdf). 

&nbsp;

##### Research interests
Bayesian analysis -- State space models -- Statistical Computing -- Financial Econometrics  
Duration modeling -- Housing market -- Machine learning
